amendment.description: Amendment prohibits juveniles from possessing semiautomatic assault weapons and large-capacity ammunition clips.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 5 and printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to prohibit juveniles under the age of 18 from possessing semi-automatic assault weapons and large capacity ammunition magazines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 354 - 69 (Roll no. 238).
